phrases: First Reunion
I will kill you!
Amata!
Cut it out, Andy!
Let me at him!
Why did not you save Mix?
Do not say that!
Amata was busy saving Zessica!
Zessica!
Now's not the time for arguing!
Focus on getting Mix back!
Get her back?
You think I would be here if I knew how to do that?
I cannot...
After the Gate closed, we could not detect any trace of spatial distortion.
Then how do we save Mix?
Where is the High Commander when we need him?
He sees something.
The fate of our two worlds...
and where to find the seed of destiny that can change it.
Ants...
and their antsy antics.
Mix...
Why did it have to turn out like this?
I never got to hold you in my arms.
I never got to take those big bangs and...
What the hell am I thinking?
I am such an idiot!
I should die!
Damn it!
Damn it!
Did you eat, Andy?
He is sent back yesterday's, too.
What else can I do for him?
Yunoha...
I have lost someone special.
I do not want Andy to go through the same thing.
Yunoha?
Let me take care of it.
It is been a week.
I hope Mix is all right.
How about Zessica?
Taking another day off.
She is really broken up.
I am so pathetic.
I am an idiot.
Why did you save me, Amata?
I know you will not choose me, so all there is for me here is pain.
That vision again?
Do not be afraid...
What the... what is going on?
Do not cry.
We are the same, you and I.
The unchosen.
What do you mean?
You, the unchosen, must know how it feels.
To carelessly take the offered hand, only for it to be snatched away.
I can rip off that hand and give it to you.
I will give you what you desire.
I will open the Dimension Gate.
In exchange, I want a promise from you.
Mikono!
Why are you going by yourself to search for the High Commander?
I do not really understand myself.
But he told me...
Mikono Suzushiro, your power is to connect those who are so divided once more.
You connect all the fragmented souls together.
And you are the one who said now's the time for everyone to work together.
Connecting people together is my job.
But that is got...
But I cannot just sit and be useless while we lose Mix!
Then I will go with you!
You are needed here if Altair attacks.
I am the only one without a combat Element power.
But...
There is something I have had to tell you.
I have not all this time because I was scared.
But when I come back...
When I come back, I will say it.
Wait!
Mikono!
You do not give Amata a break, do you?
It seems to like that boy, Kagura,
but it growls at the rest of us.
You think it does not like me or Amata?
I do not think so.
It is just jealous.
That is just how it is.
If I get to like anyone, it growls at them.
So you do like Amata, Mikono!
I did not want to get hurt.
But that hurt Amata and Zessica.
I have to tell him.
First I have to connect everybody and save Mix.
After that...
A Dimension Gate has opened above the academy!
What?
So they have finally come out!
That is...
This is unusual.
What?
We have not detected any enemy machines!
What?
That is a Gate!
Andy!
We can go to Altair and take Mix back!
Cool it!
This could be a trap!
A trap?
Mr. Donar is completely right.
The enemy is inviting us in.
I will give you what you desire.
Zessica?
With Fudo gone, we cannot send Aquarion, our main force, to Altair.
So you are just going to abandon Mix?
I understand how you feel, Andy, but...
So we cannot do anything for her?
Excuse me.
Commander!
I mean, Principal!
Chairman Crea, this is for you from High Commander Fudo.
A donut?
Eek!
Ants!
What?
They are gone?
No.
This must be a message from Fudo.
Perhaps he is telling us, Do not hesitate!
Leap into the ring!
Into the ring?
Else you will never get the sweet within.
The sweet... that is Mix!
Orders from the High Commander!
Deploy Aquarion at once!
Roger!
For you, all for you.
I granted your desire and opened the gate for you.
Girl with hair the color of grass,
you will fulfill your promise in time.
And then your turn will come, Kagura.
Vector Y, all green.
Ready to deploy any time!
I am deeply sorry.
But I will have this seat, my friend.
Cayenne?
But then who is in the Vector?
Shrade Elan deploying!
Shrade!?
I must reach the unknown world and hear its sounds...
to perfect my final melody.
I cannot do a coed Union yet.
No, I will not.
I am saving my first time for you, Mix!
Infiltration Union!
Go, Aquarion!
Aquarion Evol!
It will take time for that soldier's mind to stabilize.
But the final steps are already complete.
And those piloting talents are extraordinary.
It may not be the result I was hoping for,
but now that we have lost Jin, we could use an extra fighter.
Sir Izumo, the Dimensional Gate has opened!
What?
Did Mikage make another move?
It takes an enormous amount of energy to open the Dimension Road.
Each activation drains the precious little energy left to Altair.
Mikage knows that, and yet...
Something came over!
Where are they?
We... we cannot detect them, sir!
No mass or heat readings at all!
What?
Is there an error in the Gate?
Just a little longer, Yunoha!
Okay...
This is Altair?
What is up with this place?
The whole surface is covered with metal.
Looks like we can get in from there.
Are those graves?
There are so many...
Yunoha!
Are you okay?
I am fine.
But I can only keep them transparent for half a day at best.
We have to find Mix quickly.
The sound of this world is an old woman's rasping wail of grief.
Slow down, Andy!
Hold on, Mix!
I am coming to save you!
Yunoha, you should have stayed with the Vectors.
I wanted to come.
I wanted to see Jin's world with Tama.
Is that Alicia?
That is the Skies of Aquaria!
Why are they showing a movie from Earth on Altair?
It is not that weird.
Jin's device had an image of Alicia in it.
Mom... you are somewhere on this planet...
Hey, it is an iVision of Alicia!
Do not see that every day.
Hey, what is the matter with you?
You look funny.
Get away, Yunoha!
You almost look like Iguras.
Hey, what are these bags?
Do not touch me!
Zessica!
Creep.
Our Element Suits will attract unwanted attention.
We had best find a change.
This place stinks.
Just keep going, Andy.
There is something else weird about this place.
It appears this city is populated only by men.
Or perhaps this entire planet.
Wait, you think that is why they are kidnapping girls?
Are you all right, Zessica?
My throat's been feeling weird since we got on this planet.
Now that you mention it, mine too.
Maybe there is something in the air.
I can feel it too.
That building over there...
Definitely.
According to the data Jin left for us...
that is the enemy's command center.
Well?
We do not know if Mix is in there.
Then let us go and see!
Right.
Wow.
Andy's hole digging power is definitely stronger now.
Andy, wait!
Intruders detected in the hangar block!
All units, phase one battle stations!
We have reports that they are infiltrators from Vega!
We must assume they have Gnis!
Your training may not have prepared you for this type of combat,
so stay hidden and stay alert!
Do not move a muscle!
I said do not move!
Holes?
You would better watch it.
I do not know if I can control myself.
Now, you are going to be our guide.
Do as I say, or...
I will put a hole in your body.
There they are!
Damn it!
Andy, Amata!
We will hold them off here!
You two search for Mix!
Be careful, Amata.
Do not get into trouble.
Thanks, guys.
Amata...
A crude, ugly dissonance.
I will not allow you to interrupt the melody of love!
Contrary Twister!
They are gone.
Good.
Get up.
That wound...
Have you found them yet?
No, sir!
Damn it!
Go search area 83!
Yes, sir!
Andy, now.
Stop moving.
Why would you treat my wound?
Shut it.
I do not want them tracking us by your blood trail.
Now!
It is a dead end!
This elevator is the only way up the tower.
Then open the lock.
Please, we just want to save our friend!
And I will do anything to save that friend, understand?
Hurry it up!
Why you...
I figured it out.
I am not sure why, but you cannot kill me.
Amata, get out of here!
But...
If we both get caught, there will not be anyone left to save Mix!
Mix?
I have got this!
I am the immortal Andy!
Fly!
Andy...
What?
The suspected Vega infiltrator is headed into the upper block!
The boy with wings!
The Skies of Aquaria?
That is...
Mom!
Let me go!
Give me back my Mix!
Mix...
Mix, I want you to fill my holes!
My nostrils long to smell you,
there is a bad feeling in my pores,
and you have left a gaping hole in my heart.
First Reunion
Next Time
zetsubouteki ni kimi wa kirei sa
hanten suru sekai no kattou ni aishiaou
bokura ga miteru sekai wa itsudemo sakasama de
doushiyou mo nai koto de taigai kimatteku
namida suru hodo kizu tsuku hitomi
kokoro de sakebi nagara
tada atteitai saigo no futari masarenai mama
byouyomi ga kikoetekuru
zetsubouteki ni kimi wa kirei sa
sutareyuku doubutsu mitai ni aishiaou
nakitai kurai kimi wa kirei sa
hanten suru sekai no kattou ni kanjitai yo
You are so beautiful it is depressing
Let us love one another amidst the chaos in this backwards world
This world of ours moves in reverse
controlled by forces we cannot even touch
There is pain in your eyes so deep I want to cry
Screaming from my heart
The last couple who desire each other cannot be together
And time is running out
You are so beautiful it is depressing
Let us love one another like abandoned animals
You are so beautiful I want to cry
Let us love one another amidst the chaos in this backwards world
kimi he tsuzuku sakamichi ni
shiroi hana ga saiteta
yume kara sameta ato mo kanashii sora miteta
kono kimochi happa no ue ni susunderu
asatsuyu wo ochiru oto ni mimi wo sumaseteru no
kamisama anata ga tsukutta sekai wa kanpeki ja nai
koko de wa mainichi koi ga boroboro shindeku
hajimete suki ni natta no wo anata wa shiranai deshou
chikyuu no uragawa de ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
watashi wo wasuretemo ii kara soba ni ite hoshikatta
There were white flowers growing
on the road on the hill that leads to you
When I woke from the dream, the sky still looked sad
My feelings drift on a leaf in the wind
I am straining my ears for the sound of the dew falling
God in Heaven, this world You made is far from perfect
Down here, love is shattered day by day
You do not know what it is like to fall in love for the first time
Let it be on the other end of the world, but I wanted to be with him
Even if
You were to forget me, I wanted to be with him
